roleset.name: give medicine to before an event
roleset.note: PREMEDICATE-V NOTES: Based on sentences in Temprel data. Comparison to medicate.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from premedicate.01-v)

example.name: Almost all args and many arg ms
example.text: As she has had problems with contrast dye in the past, I will premedicate her with Medrol 12 hours and 2 hours before her CT-scan so as to minimize the risk of a reaction.
example.arg: As she has had problems with contrast dye in the past,
12 hours and 2 hours before her CT-scan
so as to mimimize the risk of a reaction

example.name: with arg 3
example.text: I will premedicate her against infection with antibiotics
